title: $timulation, Good News? 3.26.20
itunes:title: $timulation, Good News? 3.26.20
description:
In episode 595, Jack and Miles are back with Jamie Loftus to discuss famous people who have coronavirus, the #MeToo allegations against Joe Biden, social distancing possibly working, the coronavirus stimulus bill, the televangelists having solved coronavirus, a museum security guard running the social media, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Prince Charles tests positive for novel coronavirus
  2. TIME’S UP SAID IT COULD NOT FUND A #METOO ALLEGATION AGAINST JOE BIDEN, CITING ITS NONPROFIT STATUS AND HIS PRESIDENTIAL RUN
  3. New York Gov. Cuomo says social distancing efforts are working to slow coronavirus
  4. What's in the $2 trillion coronavirus stimulus bill
  5. Trump’s Spiritual Adviser Paula White Is Using the Coronavirus Crisis to Bankroll Her Church
  6. Trump’s Megachurch Allies Promise COVID-19 Snake Oil and ‘Miracles’
  7. Missouri Sues Televangelist Jim Bakker For Selling Fake Coronavirus Cure
  8. Marriage equality is responsible for coronavirus according to Christian pastor
  9. Museum gives its security chief a new job and his attempts at 'social media management' have people LOLing
  10. WATCH: Soul Makossa - Manu Dibango (Original)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
